title: History page - search bar
content: So my firefox used to have nice history tab and I could just with 2 quick clicks get into my whole search history and it had search bar but with recent update they removed it for no reason and I am really sad about it. I know that trough about:config you can do a lot with your browser So is there a chance to fix thisÂ ?
creator: ernest5991

title: Mozilla Firefox Browser 87.0 ( 32-bit )  not working in Windows 7 32 bit
content:
Mozilla Firefox Browser 87.0 ( 32-bit ) not working in Windows 7 32 bit

So I have to Version 83.0 or 84.0 and prevent it upgrading to 87.0
creator: psri6215

title: Go back button does not work on Microsoft forums or support web pages
content:
When I open a Microsoft forum or support web page, scroll up and down the page, the go back button on Firefox does not work. I have to press the button twice quickly to go back to the previous page.

Please try this link: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/march-29-2021-kb5000842-os-builds-19041-906-and-19042-906-preview-1a58a276-6a0a-47a5-aa7d-97af2d10b16d

Block pop-up windows on Firefox is unchecked (disabled). I don't have any third party security program on my system. I use Windows Defender. No such issue on Chrome and Edge.
creator: s-malik

title: Excessive RAM usage
content: Lately almost every time I use Firefox, RAM usage goes up to 5 GB, CPU usage goes to 100%, and my PC becomes unusable until I kill Firefox processes and wait 5 - 10 minutes for virtual RAM to be cleared out of disk and disk usage to return to normal. This is much worse since the last update, basically making Firefox unusable. Is anyone working on fixes so Firefox doesn't need 5 GB of RAM to open one simple web article?
creator: KennonConrad
